name: postgres-mcp
description: A blazing fast, type-safe MCP Server for AI Agents to interact with multiple PostgreSQL databases

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --minify --external fastmcp --external postgres --external dotenv --external @modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external effect --external zod --format esm --tree-shaking=true && bun build ./src/utils.ts --outfile ./dist/cli.js --target node --minify --external fastmcp --external postgres --external dotenv --external @modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external effect --external zod --format esm --tree-shaking=true && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
